candidates.title: Error improvements
candidates.body: This PR starts cleaning up the various error types in the Koto crates to standardize on using error kind enums with `thiserror`.

candidates.title: Color lib improvements
candidates.body:
- Update to the latest version of the palette crate
- Add a mix function for colors
- Add hsl/hsv color constructors

candidates.title: CLI Improvements
candidates.body:
- Replace REPL implementation with Rustyline
- Disable colored REPL output when the NO_COLOR env var is set
  - Fixes #104
- Enable VI style editing in the repl
- Add support for loading a config file for the REPL

candidates.title: API Improvements
candidates.body:
- Reorder the Koto interface and add some extra docs
- Move the 1+2 test into the Koto docs
- Extract Error and Result types for the Koto crate
- Rename Koto::run_function_by_name -> run_exported_function
- Add a Koto::compile_and_run convenience function

candidates.title: Link to the website
candidates.body:
- Update the readme
- Link to the website from the language guide intro
- Update the homepage URL in each manifest

candidates.title: Various cleanups
candidates.body:
- Switch to 'latest stable' for the MSRV
- Break out the instruction enum into its own file
- Update to the latest version of chrono
- Run cargo update
- Update to indexmap 2.0.0
- Update to criterion 0.5.1

candidates.title: Remove 'assume valid bytecode' logic
candidates.body:
- Fix the N-body benchmark, and use --all-targets instead of --workspace
- Remove the 'assume valid bytecode' paths

candidates.title: Introduce trait-based objects
candidates.body:
This PR replaces the `ExternalValue` concept with objects built using the `KotoObject` trait.

This is a significant simplification for declaring custom object types, and allows for optimizations that weren't possible with the `MetaMap` approach.

candidates.title: Support for custom iterators
candidates.body:
This PR adds support for custom iterators via `@next`/`@next_back` meta keys.

- Remove the repeatability requirement for iterator.windows()/chunks()
- Guard against recursive operations overflowing the register stack
- Introduce @next/@next_back meta keys
- Add external value support for @next/@next_back
- Introduce iterator.next_back

candidates.title: Introduce wrapped `Ptr`/`PtrMut` types
candidates.body:
- Rename RcCell -> PtrMut and move it to a new koto_memory crate
- Introduce an immutable pointer type to koto_memory and use it in ValueTuple
- Make use of PtrMut in ValueIterator
- Make use of Ptr in ConstantPool and ValueString
- Place bytecode chunks in Ptr

candidates.title: More External Value improvements
candidates.body:
- Merge the copy/deep_copy functions into the koto module
- Introduce an RcCell<T> wrapper for Rc<RefCell<T>>
- Add copy/deep_copy support for external values
- Rename ExternalValue -> External
- Unify the various builder helpers with .function()/.function_aliased()

candidates.title: Remove packed number types (Num2 / Num4)
candidates.body:
This PR introduces the `color` and `geometry` libraries, and removes the `Num2` and `Num4` types.

Fixes #201 and #202.

candidates.title: Update dependencies
candidates.body:
- Use workspace dependencies
- Update jemallocator and use it by default in CLI release builds
- Update some dependencies
- Update the just wasm command to run tests

candidates.title: Add more types of tests
candidates.body:
- Add tests that check running scripts via the CLI
- Ensure that the code example in the readme can be run
- Refresh the wasm example dependencies, and run wasm tests on CI
  - This fixes #132.

chosen_pr.title: Various cleanups
chosen_pr.body:
- Switch to 'latest stable' for the MSRV
- Break out the instruction enum into its own file
- Update to the latest version of chrono
- Run cargo update
- Update to indexmap 2.0.0
- Update to criterion 0.5.1
